title: Pakistan stock market KSE 100 index crashes nearly 2% on 'open war' with Afghanistan
desc: Pakistan stock market dropped 3,081 points, or 1.82 percent, to hit an intraday low of 165,811.88.

title: 'They seized everything': Yemen's Houthi rebels drive aid groups to the brink
desc: Aid groups - a lifeline for millions of Yemenis - are being squeezed out of existence in areas under the control of the rebels, the BBC hears.

title: Quantum fluctuations from vacuums used to modify materials
desc: Columbia University researchers have proven that quantum fluctuations from a vacuum can modify nearby materials

title: Deoghar Municipal Corporation results 2026: Will BJP retain seat the Mayoral seat?
desc: Deoghar Municipal Corporation results 2026: The corporation plays a crucial role in managing civic services, infrastructure, and urban planning in Deoghar. The last election was conducted in 2015.

title: Man refuses to bear child of another man, shares ordeal on live TV
desc: A young Ghanaian man named Amoako Danso Fredrick has shared a painful personal experience on live TV, revealing how he discovered that his girlfriend was pregnant with another man's child and his refusal to take responsibility for the pregnancy.

title: Feffe Bussi advises child stars on music careers
